original_text: And many nations shall pass by this city, and they shall say every man to his neighbour, Wherefore hath the Lord done thus unto this great city?
korean_text: 여러 민족들이 이 성읍으로 지나가며 서로 말하기를 여호와가 이 큰 성읍에 이같이 행함은 어찌 됨인고 하겠고

sentences.original_text: And many nations shall pass by this city
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 많은 나라들이 이 성을 지나갈 것이며

sentences.original_text: and they shall say every man to his neighbour
Wherefore hath the Lord done thus
